title: corruptant ward cost?
body:
I'm not typically one to complain about cost of things, and I just find it more odd that riot would charge 1RP extra on a bundle for the corruptant ward when it's "included" in the bundle. Like what if I didnt want that (I totally do, but I don't play ori so just stuck with buying the kha skin). I'm just curious as to the thought process 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: We wanted players who bought the entire bundle to be able to get a little extra, which is why we decided to include the extra Corruptant Icon. It's a little weird to see that icon only has a cost of 1RP, but essentially it's just a little extra something. I would say a "freebie" but the store would straight up have a nuclear meltdown if the item didn't have a price on it at all xD!

very weird indeed, I kinda wish there were two additional bundles for each champ instead, so I didnt have to choose between an icon or a ward skin since I didnt buy the bundle; but beggars cant be choosers lol. awesome skin though, can't wait to get my jungle on this season now
